name: generate-env
description: Compile configuration from JSON files using a script file.

scripts.compile-linux: pkg --targets=node10-linux-x64 -o build/generate-env-linux --config package.json index.js && chmod +x build/generate-env-linux
scripts.compile-alpine: pkg --targets=node10-alpine-x64 -o build/generate-env-alpine --config package.json index.js && chmod +x build/generate-env-alpine
